xml-extension.xml: <extension target="org.nuxeo.ecm.platform.ui.web.ContentViewService" point="contentViews"> <contentView name="DAM-CustomSearch"> <flags> <flag>DAM</flag> </flags> <resultLayouts> <layout name="dam_box_listing_ajax" title="label.dam.box.listing.title" translateTitle="true" iconPath="/icons/document_listing_icon_2_columns_icon.png" showCSVExport="false" showPDFExport="false" showSyndicationLinks="false" /> <layout name="dam_listing_ajax" title="label.dam.listing.title" translateTitle="true" iconPath="/icons/document_listing_icon.png" showCSVExport="false" showPDFExport="false" showSyndicationLinks="false" /> </resultLayouts> </contentView> </extension>
